author: kanagwa
content: We plan to add support for this feature on Blobscan API üëç

author: christopherbrumm
content: How are you planning to implement that in detail?

author: kanagwa
content:
We already built a public API to query per blobs and transactions from our db. 

And now we are working on adding tags on transactions for main rollups to show on our website. As mentioned above we will tag depending on sequencer address sender.

Then our plan is to allow to filter the API request using the rollup tags.
